702288f-a.text:
3rd Avenue - north from 27th Street.
P. L. Sperr  April 21, 1941

702682f-b.text:
27th Street, north side, east from Third Avenue. The houses in the foreground were later torn down for the construction of Gowannus Parkway, a ltnk in the Belt Parkway system. View 2 shows tte same site after the corner buildings were razed. Note the W. P. A. of'ice
on the left.
View 1: July 21, 1940
View 2: October 18, 1940
P. L. Sperr  Vi e Sg  .SN T N607

702287f-b.text:
3rd Avenue, at the S. E. corner of 27th Street. These buildings were raxed later in the year to make possible the widening of the avenue and its incorporation into the Belt Parkway. The tracks
afe on Third Avenue.
